alert.note: Alert for Rapides; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Rapides and northeastern Vernon Parishes through 1215 AM CDT... At 1145 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hutton, or 10 miles northeast of Slagle, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alexandria, Boyce, Hineston, Lena, Alexandria International Airport, Slagle, Lacamp, Clifton, Flatwoods, Otis, Elmer, Leander, Sieper, Gardner, Hutton and Simpson. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 84 and 109. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
